SEARCH
Package User.Model

Class User

java.lang.Object
User.Model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
public class User extends Object implements IEntity
Represents a User entity within the system. Implements IEntity and includes attributes such as hospital ID, role, blacklist status, and last login timestamp. Provides methods for login, password change, and conversion to CSV format.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String hospitalID, String passwordHash, String role)
      Constructs a User object with the specified hospital ID, password hash, and role. By default, the user is not blacklisted, and no login has been recorded initially.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique hospital ID for the user.
      passwordHash - The hashed password for the user.
      role - The role assigned to the user (e.g., Administrator, Doctor, etc.).

  • Method Details

    • getHospitalID

      public String getHospitalID()
      Gets the hospital ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The hospital ID.

    • setHospitalID

      public void setHospitalID(String hospitalID)
      Sets the hospital ID of the user.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The new hospital ID.

    • getPasswordHash

      public String getPasswordHash()
      Gets the hashed password of the user.
      Returns:
      The password hash.

    • setPasswordHash

      public void setPasswordHash(String passwordHash)
      Sets the hashed password of the user.
      Parameters:
      passwordHash - The new password hash.

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Gets the role of the user.
      Returns:
      The role (e.g., Administrator, Doctor, etc.).

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if the user has the "Administrator" role.
      Returns:
      True if the role is "Administrator", false otherwise.

    • isBlacklist

      public boolean isBlacklist()
      Checks if the user is blacklisted.
      Returns:
      True if blacklisted, false otherwise.

    • setBlacklist

      public void setBlacklist(boolean isBlacklist)
      Sets the blacklist status of the user.
      Parameters:
      isBlacklist - True to blacklist the user, false otherwise.

    • getLastLogin

      public LocalDateTime getLastLogin()
      Gets the last login timestamp of the user.
      Returns:
      The last login timestamp, or null if no login has occurred.

    • setLastLogin

      public void setLastLogin(LocalDateTime lastLogin)
      Sets the last login timestamp of the user.
      Parameters:
      lastLogin - The new last login timestamp.

    • login

      public boolean login(String hospitalID, String passwordHash)
      Verifies the login credentials provided by the user.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID entered by the user.
      passwordHash - The password hash entered by the user.
      Returns:
      True if the credentials match and the user is not blacklisted, false otherwise.

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the user.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Returns:
      A string containing the hospital ID, role, blacklist status, and last login timestamp.
